entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 4.
